item.title: 零售商 Joann 考虑一年内第二次申请破产
item.description: 据知情人士透露，不到一年前摆脱破产保护的织物和工艺品零售商 Joann Inc.【原文：Joann Inc., the fabric and crafts retailer that emerged from Chapter 11 less than a year ago, is considering filing for bankruptcy again as it runs out of cash, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: HPE 为埃隆-马斯克的 X 赢得 10 亿美元人工智能服务器交易
item.description: 惠普企业公司赢得了一项价值超过 10 亿美元的交易，为埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 社交网络提供优化用于人工智能工作的服务器。【原文：Hewlett Packard Enterprise Co. won a deal worth more than $1 billion to provide Elon Musk’s X social network with servers optimized for artificial intelligence work.】

item.title: 马克-扎克伯格在乔-罗根的播客中抨击拜登政府
item.description: 马克-扎克伯格（Mark Zuckerberg）在与播客乔-罗根（Joe Rogan）的谈话中批评了拜登政府，称该政府在讨论大流行病期间如何管理与 Covid-19 相关的内容时，会对 Meta Platforms 公司的员工 "尖叫 "和 "咒骂"。【原文：Mark Zuckerberg criticized the Biden administration during a conversation with podcaster Joe Rogan, claiming the administration would “scream” and “curse” at Meta Platforms Inc. employees amid discussions about how to moderate content related to Covid-19 during the pandemic.】

item.title: 押注波动性加剧的石油交易商因美国制裁大获全胜
item.description: 买入期权押注原油将走出低谷的石油交易商将获得回报，因为对俄罗斯的新制裁导致原油价格飙升。【原文：Oil traders who bought options in a bet that crude oil would snap out of its doldrums are set to reap the rewards as prices surge on fresh sanctions against Russia.】

item.title: 爆炸性就业报告加剧华尔街对 "双输 "市场的担忧
item.description: 事情本不该如此。随着经济的蓬勃发展、美联储的友好支持以及唐纳德-特朗普入主白宫，华尔街在日历翻转时看到的只有上涨。【原文：It wasn’t supposed to be this way. With the economy booming, a friendly Federal Reserve at its back and Donald Trump headed to the White House, Wall Street saw nothing but upside as the calendar turned.】

item.title: 美国航空公司 401（k）诉讼案中，ESG 反对者获得了新的胜利
item.description: 德克萨斯州一名联邦法官周五裁定，美国航空公司（American Airlines Inc.【原文：American Airlines Inc. violated federal law by filling its 401(k) plan with funds from investment companies that pursue environmental, social, and corporate governance goals, a Texas federal judge ruled Friday in the biggest victory yet for opponents of the strategy.】

item.title: 美达撤回多元化和包容性努力，讨好特朗普
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司正在解散其在多元化和包容性方面的许多努力，并告诉员工，他们将不再被要求为空缺职位面试来自代表性不足背景的应聘者，或寻求与多元化供应商开展业务。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. is disbanding many of its diversity and inclusion efforts, telling employees they will no longer be required to interview candidates from under-represented backgrounds for open roles, or look to do business with diverse suppliers.】

item.title: 调查显示，页岩企业高管提高标准以促进天然气钻探
item.description: 美国大平原和落基山脉的页岩油老板们正在提高天然气价格门槛，以获取利润，并大幅增加供暖和发电厂燃料的钻探量。【原文：Shale bosses in the US Great Plains and Rocky Mountains are raising the natural gas price threshold they need to reap profits and substantially boost drilling for the heating and power plant fuel.】

item.title: Galp 任命两名董事会成员担任石油公司临时首席执行官
item.description: 继葡萄牙石油公司前任首席执行官本周早些时候辞职后，Galp Energia SGPS SA 公司挑选董事会成员玛丽亚-若昂-卡里奥卡（Maria Joao Carioca）和若昂-迪奥戈-马克斯-达席尔瓦（Joao Diogo Marques da Silva）担任临时联合首席执行官。【原文：Galp Energia SGPS SA picked board members Maria Joao Carioca and Joao Diogo Marques da Silva to be interim co—chief executive officers of the Portuguese oil firm, following the resignation of the previous CEO earlier this week.】

item.title: 奢侈品物流公司法拉利集团被指将考虑 IPO
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，专营珠宝和其他奢侈品的物流公司法拉利集团（Ferrari Group Plc）正在权衡首次公开募股的可能性。【原文：Ferrari Group Plc, a logistics firm specializing in jewelry and other luxury goods, is weighing a potential initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 风险最高的 CLO 债务溢价徘徊在 2008 年危机以来的最低点附近
item.description: 一个重要的债券持有人群体对杠杆贷款违约的前景越来越乐观，使其证券的风险溢价降至 2008 年金融危机以来的最低水平左右。【原文：A key group of bondholders is increasingly optimistic about the outlook for defaults in leveraged loans, sending risk premiums on their securities to around the lowest levels since the 2008 financial crisis.】

item.title: 最高法院表示可能维持美国对 TikTok 的禁令
item.description: 最高法院的法官们表示，他们可能会支持一项法律，该法律规定，如果流行的社交媒体平台 TikTok 在 1 月 19 日之前不被其中国母公司出售，那么该平台将在美国被禁用。【原文：Supreme Court justices signaled they are likely to uphold a law that would ban the popular social media platform TikTok in the US if it isn’t sold by its Chinese parent company by Jan. 19.】

item.title: 墨丘利高层二人在能源危机中分享 10 亿美元薪酬
item.description: 交易商摩科瑞能源集团有限公司（Mercuria Energy Group Ltd.）的两位高管将在 2023 年分享超过 10 亿美元的红利，这是历史上大宗商品交易商个人获得红利最多的时期之一。【原文：The two top executives at trading house Mercuria Energy Group Ltd. shared over $1 billion in dividends in 2023, marking one of the biggest paydays for any individual commodity traders in history.】

item.title: 投资者担心火灾基金，加州公用事业公司股价下跌
item.description: 加州公用事业巨头爱迪生国际公司（Edison International）和 PG&E 公司（PG&E Corp.【原文：California utility giants Edison International and PG&E Corp. fell amid investor concerns about the size of a state wildfire fund set up to backstop power companies if their equipment is linked to a catastrophic wildfire.】

item.title: 尼日利亚将获得免税进口政策下的首批大米货物
item.description: 尼日利亚将接收一批糙米，以缓解不断攀升的食品成本对消费者的挤压。【原文：Nigeria will receive a shipment of brown rice as it seeks to alleviate climbing food costs that are squeezing consumers.】

item.title: 洛杉矶大火引发网络阴谋论浪潮
item.description: 2025 年 1 月 8 日星期三，美国加利福尼亚州阿尔塔蒂纳，伊顿大火中路边倒下的路灯。14 年来洛杉矶地区遭受的最具破坏性的风暴正在煽起野火，成千上万的居民正在逃命，预计危险的阵风至少还将持续两天。摄影师：迈克尔-尼格罗/布鲁姆伯格【原文：A fallen street light on the road during the Eaton Fire in Altadena, California, US, on Wednesday, Jan. 8, 2025. Photographer: Michael Nigro/Bloomberg】

item.title: 优酷用户将闲置视频素材卖给人工智能公司
item.description: 优酷用户和其他数字内容创作者正在向人工智能公司出售他们闲置的视频素材，以寻求独家视频来更好地训练他们的人工智能算法，每笔交易往往能净赚数千美元。【原文：YouTubers and other digital content creators are selling their unused video footage to artificial intelligence companies seeking exclusive videos to better train their AI algorithms, oftentimes netting thousands of dollars per deal.】

item.title: King Street 将在 Generali 的支持下启动私募债务基金
item.description: King Street Capital 将推出新的私人信贷基金，意大利保险公司 Generali 旗下的资产管理部门 Generali Investments 将为该基金提供约 7000 万美元的投资。【原文：King Street Capital is set to launch a new private credit fund, bolstered by an investment of about $70 million from Generali Investments, the asset management arm of Italian insurance firm Generali.】

item.title: 据称 KKR 将考虑以 70 亿英镑出售英国回收公司 Viridor
item.description: KKR&Co.正在探索 Viridor Ltd.的各种选择，包括可能出售这家英国废物管理公司，包括债务在内，该公司的估值可能高达 70 亿英镑（85 亿美元）。【原文：KKR & Co. is exploring options for Viridor Ltd., including a potential sale that could value the UK waste management firm at as much as £7 billion ($8.5 billion) including debt, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 斯洛伐克数千人谴责总理最近访问普京
item.description: 周五，数千名斯洛伐克人在全国各地举行抗议活动，表达他们对罗伯特-菲佐总理上个月访问俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京的愤怒。【原文：Thousands of Slovaks protested across the country on Friday, voicing their anger over Prime Minister Robert Fico’s visit with Russian President Vladimir Putin last month.】

item.title: 美国工厂职位减少 8.7 万个，劳动力市场依然强劲
item.description: 美国制造业去年减少了 8.7 万个工作岗位，这是自 2009 年经济大衰退期以来的最大损失，其中不包括 2020 年冠状病毒流行年。【原文：The US manufacturing sector shed 87,000 jobs last year, the biggest loss since 2009 during the Great Recession excluding the coronavirus pandemic year of 2020.】

item.title: 2024 年美国招聘引擎持续运转，新增 220 万个工作岗位
item.description: 2024 年，美国经济增加了 220 万个就业岗位，虽然比上一年有所放缓，但仍是一个显著的恢复迹象，这在 12 个月前是很少有专家预料到的。【原文：The US economy added 2.2 million jobs in 2024, a slowdown from the previous year but still a remarkable sign of resilience that few pundits had expected twelve months earlier.】

item.title: 洛杉矶公用事业公司市政债券在毁灭性野火中下跌
item.description: 在南加州野火肆虐的情况下，洛杉矶市政公用事业公司出售的电力收益债券周五下跌。【原文：Power revenue bonds sold by Los Angeles’s municipal utility dropped on Friday amid the devastating wildfires in Southern California.】

item.title: 拜登告别时制裁俄罗斯石油为何意义重大
item.description: 就在乔-拜登离开白宫、由唐纳德-特朗普接任总统的十天前，美国周五宣布对俄罗斯的石油贸易实施迄今为止最全面、最严厉的制裁。【原文：The US on Friday announced the most sweeping and aggressive sanctions yet on Russia’s oil trade, just ten days before Joe Biden leaves the White House to be replaced by Donald Trump as president.】
